plan:
1. Keep your focus strong! A clear plan will help you master Operating Systems step-by-step.

| Day   | Study Focus                                | Activities                                    |
|-------|--------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------|
| Day 1 | Introduction & Basics                      | Read about OS definition, functions, types.  |
| Day 2 | Process Management                         | Study process concept, states, and scheduling algorithms. |
| Day 3 | Memory Management                         | Learn about RAM, virtual memory, paging, segmentation. |
| Day 4 | File Systems & I/O                        | Understand file system structure and I/O management. |
| Day 5 | Review & Practice                         | Revise all topics; solve past exam questions or quizzes. |

### Suggested FREE Resources:
- [Operating Systems: Three Easy Pieces (PDF)](http://pages.cs.wisc.edu/~remzi/OSTEP/) — Comprehensive and beginner-friendly.
- [GeeksforGeeks OS Tutorials](https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/operating-systems/) — Simple explanations with examples.
- [TutorialsPoint OS Basics](https://www.tutorialspoint.com/operating_system/index.htm) — Easy text-based tutorials for quick reading.
